title: Honor 0
body: A while ago, i was toxic for a couple of days, and on 3 of them I was reported so I got banned for 15 days. Now I lost the end season rewards and can't even earn S chests because of honor 0 and inegibility of rewards. The thing is, I'm here watching people that say even after 4 months without typing are still honor 0 without even getting chests. I'm not sure if it's better just to create a new account or give up the game entirely. I don't even mind a chat ban, but chests are important to me because of the rewards. And going from honor 3 to 0 is a bit rough.. And we have no timer or any way to check our progress to having rewards back.. doesn't that defeat the purpose? Idk.

If you harass people but don't get reported, you don't honor up because the system can detect it even though no one was offended.
